General.Name: Titan Logix Corp.
General.Description: Titan Logix Corp. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and marketing of technology fluid management solutions in Canada, the United States, and internationally. It offers mobile monitoring systems and smart truck systems. The company also provides hardware products, including level gauges, probes, displays, mobile accessories, flow meters, and transmitters. It serves oil and gas, chemical, produced water, vacuum, aviation, and fuel and lubricant industries. The company was formerly known as Titan Pacific Resources Ltd. Titan Logix Corp. was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Edmonton, Canada.
General.Address: 93 Street NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6E 5P5
